response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This product, valued at $1,000,000 to you, holds a special place in our offerings due to its unparalleled quality and unique features designed to meet your specific needs.

To make this opportunity more attractive, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a price that reflects its immense value while ensuring a fair return for us. My proposal is to extend the offer at a price of $950,000.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it presents a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
